mapper.select: select * from staff order by staff_no DESC
mapper.insert: insert into staff (staff_name, staff_phone, staff_email, staff_team, staff_joindate, staff_pw) values (#{staff_name}, #{staff_phone}, #{staff_email}, #{staff_team}, now(), #{staff_phone})
mapper.update: update staff set staff_phone=#{staff_phone}, staff_email=#{staff_email}, staff_team=#{staff_team} where staff_no=#{staff_no}
mapper.select: select staff_name from staff where staff_no=#{staff_no} and staff_pw=#{staff_pw}
